alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 7:26PM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam affecting Clarke, Washington and Choctaw Counties. For the Tombigbee River...including Coffeeville Dam, Leroy...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, pastureland becomes flooded. Livestock should be moved to higher ground. Old Ferry Road near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 26.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Tuesday evening to a crest of 29.3 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
